casebody.data:
MOTOROLA, INC., Appellant, v. Les BROWNLEE, Acting Secretary of the Army, Appellee. No. 03-1376. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: Dec. 3, 2003.

Before RADER, Circuit Judge, ARCHER, Senior Circuit Judge, and BRYSON, Circuit Judge.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
